Sentencas: High fuel utilization rate is the basis for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) to achieve high power generation efficiency.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the severe concentration polarization, namely limiting current behavior, hinders cell performances in the situation of high utilization rates.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a planar SOFC with 10 x 10 cm2 working area is tested using both voltammetry and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) at various air and fuel flow rates.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cell resistance is obtained from the smoothed derivatives of voltage vs. current curves as well as the Nyquist plots of EIS results.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that resistance vs. current plots reveal the limiting current behavior better than voltage vs. current curves.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is indicated that cell resistance is a more suitable and robust criterion for the limiting current behavior of fuel cells.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also found that the high reactant utilization rate leading to the limiting current behavior is stable.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This finding can provide useful information about fuel sensitivity analysis.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Overall, cell resistance is a useful indicator that quantitatively describes the working status of SOFCs.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Setting a resistance threshold is a good option to maintain safe and healthy operating status, especially for industrial SOFCs.
Titulo: Experimental investigations of cell resistances to characterize the concentration polarization behavior of 10 x10 cm2 solid oxide fuel cells
